snippet: Mrs. Clinton said that she had given the State Department all of the work-related emails that were on the personal account she used while she was secretary of state.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, appearing under oath before federal court, says she has given State Dept all work-related emails from personal email account she used during her tenure as secretary of state.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton said that she had given the State Department all of the work-related emails that were on the personal account she used while she was secretary of state.

headline.main: All Emails Were Provided, Hillary Clinton Says in Statement
headline.print_headline: All Emails Were Provided, Clinton Says in Statement
